climatePledgeFriendly.details: U.S. EPA Safer Choice certified products contain safer ingredients for human health and the environment.

features: Tough on baby stains, gentle on skin. Stains like blueberries, carrot and potato baby food, vegetable and fruit baby food, and grape juice don't stand a chance. Its hypoallergenic formula powers through stains, yet it’s delicate on newborn skin

No preservatives, no phosphates, no dyes. Baby detergent for newborns needs to be gentle on their skin. That’s why this gentle liquid baby detergent contains no preservatives, no phosphates, and no dyes.

Pediatrician and dermatologist tested. This hypoallergenic laundry detergent is a great baby detergent for newborns and infants. It’s a liquid washing detergent that’s gentle on delicate skin yet tough on stubborn baby stains

An EPA Safer Choice certified baby detergent. Meets U.S. EPA Safer Choice product standards. Free from unnecessary chemicals, dyes, phosphates, GMOs, added preservatives, brighteners, parabens, or animal-derived ingredients.

Cleans tough stains in cold water. This hypoallergenic baby laundry detergent is ideal as a High Efficiency (HE) laundry detergent liquid for a powerful clean that’s gentle on newborn skin. Contains trusted ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda
body.description: For a liquid laundry detergent specially created with your new baby in mind, choose ARM & HAMMER Baby Hypoallergenic Liquid Laundry Detergent. It’s a dermatologist-tested detergent that’s tough on baby stains yet gentle on baby's skin. You'll want to add this baby laundry detergent to your list of baby essentials because its hypoallergenic formula contains no preservatives, no phosphates, and no dyes. Yet it removes tough stains from your baby’s clothes and bedding, such as baby foods and milk. To use, simply fill the cap to Bar A for medium-sized loads, or use half a capful for energy-saving cold water cycles compared to washing in warm water. This baby detergent is also a hypoallergenic washing liquid that’s SaferChoice certified, which means it meets EPA Safer Choice product standards to be safer for people, pets and the planet. It’s a baby essential that’s free from unnecessary chemicals so there are no dyes, phosphates, GMOs, added preservatives, brighteners or parabens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As a mom, I've always been conscious of choosing safe and effective products for my baby. ARM & HAMMER Baby has been a go-to brand for our household, and it continues to impress me.The baby-specific products in their range have proven to be gentle yet efficient in tackling various parenting challenges. From diaper changing to laundry, their products have been reliable and effective.The diaper pail refill bags, for instance, lock away odors effectively, which is a big relief for any mom. The laundry detergent is gentle on my baby's sensitive skin while doing an excellent job at removing stains.What sets ARM & HAMMER Baby apart is their commitment to using safe and baby-friendly ingredients. This is a huge priority for me as a mom. I appreciate the peace of mind that comes with knowing I'm using products that won't harm my baby or the environment.Their products are readily available and reasonably priced, making it easy for parents to provide the best for their little ones without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle, affordable, and does the work!
reviews.reviewText: I love this detergent. We have to do baby's laundry like twice a week, and the detergent will last a while. It smells really nice and cleans up well anything that might leave stains. Our baby's clothes have absolutely no stains and we don't use anything but this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great and does the job
reviews.reviewText: We love the smell of this! Smells like clean baby. It also works well for taking out gross baby fluids from clothes and fabric from chairs etc. without harsh chemicals. Gentle enough that it doesn’t make baby breakout but strong enough to clean gross baby messes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great detergent for kids! I love Ivory detergent but it’s so hard to find. This is my next choice, great smell and price point and washes well too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best baby clothes cleaner!
reviews.reviewText: I loved this baby clothes cleaner, it smells awesome and it's gentle for baby's skin. Absolutely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Scent is strong
reviews.reviewText: I think this stuff smells great but it MUST be overpowering for a newborn… it’s very strong. Besides that, it has worked on some pretty dirty baby clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Removes Stains Easily
reviews.reviewText: I wash my baby's clothes with this. Quite effective for stain removal and it has a pleasant scent that's not too strong. I will continue to purchase this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this detergent
reviews.reviewText: Product can with a little leakage but other than that, detergent smells amazing
Sí quita las manchas pero hay que tallar antes de la lavadora. Muy agradable aroma para recordar la etapa de bebé.
